name: GaaP MCP Tool: Audit Log Event

parameters.query:
-- Set tenant context for RLS
SET app.current_tenant_id = '{{ $json.tenant_id }}';

-- Insert audit event
INSERT INTO gaap_mcp.audit_events (
  audit_event_id,
  tenant_id,
  correlation_id,
  event_type,
  entity_type,
  entity_id,
  previous_state,
  new_state,
  state_change_summary,
  event_hash,
  previous_hash,
  metadata,
  event_timestamp,
  source_tool,
  source_workflow,
  source_ip
) VALUES (
  '{{ $json.audit_event_id }}'::UUID,
  '{{ $json.tenant_id }}'::UUID,
  '{{ $json.correlation_id }}',
  '{{ $json.event_type }}',
  '{{ $json.entity_type }}',
  '{{ $json.entity_id }}',
  {{ $json.previous_state ? "'" + JSON.stringify($json.previous_state).replace(/'/g, "''") + "'::JSONB" : 'NULL' }},
  {{ $json.new_state ? "'" + JSON.stringify($json.new_state).replace(/'/g, "''") + "'::JSONB" : 'NULL' }},
  {{ $json.state_change_summary ? "'" + $json.state_change_summary.replace(/'/g, "''") + "'" : 'NULL' }},
  '{{ $json.event_hash }}',
  {{ $json.previous_hash ? "'" + $json.previous_hash + "'" : 'NULL' }},
  '{{ JSON.stringify($json.metadata).replace(/'/g, "''") }}'::JSONB,
  '{{ $json.event_timestamp }}'::TIMESTAMPTZ,
  '{{ $json.source_tool }}',
  {{ $json.source_workflow ? "'" + $json.source_workflow + "'" : 'NULL' }},
  {{ $json.source_ip ? "'" + $json.source_ip + "'::INET" : 'NULL' }}
)
RETURNING audit_event_id, event_hash, recorded_at;

-- Update audit event with CamDL anchor info
UPDATE gaap_mcp.audit_events
SET 
  camdl_anchored = TRUE,
  camdl_anchor_id = '{{ $('Merge CamDL Result').first().json.camdl_anchor_id }}',
  camdl_block_number = {{ $('Merge CamDL Result').first().json.camdl_block_number }},
  camdl_tx_hash = '{{ $('Merge CamDL Result').first().json.camdl_tx_hash }}',
  camdl_anchored_at = NOW()
WHERE audit_event_id = '{{ $('Merge CamDL Result').first().json.audit_event_id }}'::UUID;
